testsuite.name: maintestfiles.GeneralStoreTestCases

testcase.name: happyPathTestCase
testcase.system-out: Created objects of all the Page classes. Country selected. Entered the name. Selected Gender as female. Tapped on Lets shop button. User is on Products screen. Desired products have been selected. Tapped on cart icon at the top right corner User is on cart screen. Cart consists of correct products that were previously selected. Sum of product prices is equal to the total price displayed. Selected the send me email check box Tapped on visit the website button. Entered 'General Store' in search field on the website. Tapped on Back button to navigate back to Home screen. User is on Homescreen.
